actions.ACTIVATE_SEND_SUCCESS: {{email}} has been sent an activation link. Please check your inbox.
actions.ACTIVATE_TOKEN_FAILURE: Activation token is invalid or has expired.

mailgun.body: Thanks for signing up for {{site}}! Please confirm your email address by clicking on the link below.
mailgun.footer: You're receiving this email because you recently created a new {{site}} account or added a new email address. If this wasn't you, please ignore this email.
mailgun.link: Or copy and paste the following into your browser: {{confirmLink}}
mailgun.title: E-mail Verification

Profile.Data Appendix Description: These data tables represent the underlying datasets used to power each visualization featured in this report.

actions.RESET_SEND_SUCCESS: {{email}} has been sent a password reset. Please check your inbox.
actions.RESET_TOKEN_FAILURE: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.

mailgun.body: Someone has requested that your {{site}} account password be reset. If this wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
mailgun.footer: Or just visit {{resetLink}} in your browser
mailgun.title: Password Reset

SignUp.PrivacyTermsText: By checking this box, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
SignUp.PrivacyText: By checking this box, you agree to our Privacy Policy
SignUp.TermsText: By checking this box, you agree to our Terms of Service

error.Exists: E-mail or Username already in use
error.TermsAgree: Must agree to terms to continue

error.chartfail_detail: This chart failed during rendering. You can try re-rendering it, or report the problem to us.
error.disconnected_detail: Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.empty_detail:
The server doesn't have data for the parameters you requested.
Please try again with more broad filters, members, or drilldowns, or file an issue.
error.internal_detail:
There was an internal error in Vizbuilder.
If this keeps happening, please file an issue including the permalink and/or an screenshot of the parameters in the sidebar.
error.network_detail:
There was an error during the connection to the server. This might be a problem with your internet connection, or with the data source server.
Please try again later, or file an issue.
error.nocharts_detail:
This is probably an issue with vizbuilder.
Please file an issue indicating the set of parameters that outputted this result.
error.nocharts_title: No charts could be computed with these parameters.
error.overload_detail: The parameters defined returned too many data points. Please try a query with less granularity.
error.server_detail: The server had an internal problem while processing your request. Please try again later, or if the problem persists, file an issue.
error.unknown_detail:
An unexpected error happened.
If this keeps happening, please file an issue including the permalink and/or an screenshot of the parameters in the sidebar.
